references.paper_title: PIFU: Pixel-aligned implicit function for high-resolution clothed human digitization
references.reason: This paper introduces the PIFU method, a foundational implicit function technique for high-resolution 3D human digitization that is frequently referenced and built upon in subsequent works.

references.paper_title: SIFU: Side-view conditioned implicit function for real-world usable clothed human reconstruction
references.reason: This paper presents SIFU, a significant advancement that addresses the limitations of previous methods by incorporating side-view information for improved real-world applicability and reconstruction quality.

references.paper_title: Global-correlated 3D-decoupling transformer for clothed avatar reconstruction
references.reason: This paper details a transformer-based framework that significantly improves the efficiency and reconstruction quality of clothed human models, offering a novel approach to the problem.

references.paper_title: Sapiens: Foundation for human vision models
references.reason: Sapiens is a high-resolution human foundation model that is highly influential in the present work, demonstrating the importance of large-scale image datasets and their impact on human image representation models.

references.paper_title: LGM: Large multi-view Gaussian model for high-resolution 3D content creation
references.reason: LGM provides a large-scale Gaussian-based representation of high-resolution 3D models, which serves as a crucial comparison point in evaluating the performance and efficiency of novel 3D human reconstruction models.
